thread.title: Live NRL trial: Dragons v Rabbitohs
thread.title_full: Live NRL trial: Dragons v Rabbitohs

title: Live NRL trial: Dragons v Rabbitohs
text:
Live Charity Shield: St George Illawarra Dragons v South Sydney Rabbitohs scores, news, updates, blog February 19, 2017 2:00pm Source: FOX SPORTS ROUND one spots are on the line when St George Illawarra take on South Sydney in the annual pre-season Charity Shield clash at ANZ Stadium. 
Dragons coach Paul McGregor will be looking to his playmaker to see who will seize the opportunity to partner Gareth Widdop in the halves. 
So all eyes will be on Kurt Mann, Jai Field and Josh McCrone with the trio named to play. 
LIVE stream the Dragons v Rabbitohs on FOX SPORTS. Get your free 2-week FOXTEL PLAY trial and start watching in minutes. SIGN UP NOW > 
Meanwhile, Robbie Farah and Damien Cook will go head to head to see who will be the Rabbitohsâ€™ starting hooker for their season opener against the Wests Tigers. 
The game kicks off at 4pm. 
Follow all the action in the live blog below. View All Comments The latest sports news, in your inbox daily. Email
